body:
Hi Erik,

You can not choose which component outputs will be calculated and which not.
You can see in this [video where optimal tilt-azimuth is being searched with Galapagos](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/video/annual-optimal-tilt-and-azimuth-angle-of-an-unshaded-pv-array) that the speed is also slow. I speeded up the framerate 40 times. If I remember correctly the Galapagos was working for a couple of hours. In your case it may work less as you only have one slider connected to the **Genome** input.

This is one of the reasons why TOF component should be used, instead.
